data.text: @AmyA1A He didn't want the first booster either though and that helped protect alot of people from severe disease.  I'm not sure he is seeing the data clearly on this.  Protection from severe also waned at a higher than expected rate.  Moving to a multivalent should fix it.
@AmyA1A I think vaccines should last at least a full year per dose or they’re worthless.
@AmyA1A @OnLocals Again, I'm just really surprised. Both of those guys are super pro-vaccine.
@BalkyHillMama I stole it from ZDoggMD’s @OnLocals page 🤓 https://t.co/I3nRlL3OP3 https://t.co/WBxcRVmxA1
@AmyA1A I am amazed that Dr. Offit would say this, but I'm glad to hear it.
